TopicTitle: Who still watches the Pokemon Anime?

Articles.Content:
I don\'t.

I think it has been getting worse and worse over the years.

When it first released back in 1998 (Or something) it was worth getting up and watching.

Of course I never got to see the older episodes because I was born in 2000.

The Anime is just lopsided now, it\'s not funny like it used to be.

I watch it once in a while for about 30 seconds to see how bad it\'s gotten.

(I make a lot of posts in the off-topic forum!)
I watched it when I was younger. I really enjoyed it too. But if it ever comes on by chance now, I can\'t stand it. It\'s nothing like it used to be.
